attributes.additional_details:
All drug dealers (sellers) know that the drugs they are selling are eventually going to kill the people who buy them. This makes them guilty of manslaughter.
A new law should be introduced to the effect of “ANY PERSON FOUND GUILTY OF SELLING DRUGS SHOULD GET AN AUTOMATIC CUSTODIAL SENTENCE OF AT LEAST 10 YEARS – with no early release.
Eventually this would slow if not stop the sale of drugs.
